img_text: Baby? Is everything okay? 11:36 AM I am incredibly proud of you I am thankful that you are my fiancée and that you are the Mother of my children 11:42 AM yeah i'm just dragging dumb ass people, i'm okay. but joon you don't need to be, i know how much you hate how much drama i get caught up in and i'm sorry but these things piss me off. i'm always being painted as the bad guy when i don't even do shit 11:43 AM I know baby. I love you for you. I am very proud of you and can't wait to marry you. I love you so much
